experiences.title: Research Assistant
experiences.description:
- Keung Lab in Department of Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering
- Research focus: DNA-based data storage
- Conducted over 300 PCRs in support of solid-state DNA transfer experiments, procured and tested 5 compounds for increasing efficiency of DNA transfers, assembled oligonucleotide codewords to increase the efficiency of DNA data synthesis, and quantified the electrostatic transfer of powdered DNA
